404.paragraph: The page you are looking for could not be found. It might have been removed, renamed, or did not exist in the first place.

account.avatarDescription: This is a user icon and appears in previews of your profile & listings throughout.
account.deactivateAccountTip: Deactivating your account will remove  a few minutes. You can sign back in anytime to reactivate your account and restore its content
account.strongPasswordTip: It's a good idea to use a strong password that you're not using elsewhere.
account.resetPasswordTip: Need to change your password? We’ll send you a link to reset it.

referral.earnWithReferralTip:
Invite your friends and family and receive free tokens. Imagine giving your unique referral link to your crypto-friend and he or she contributes tokens using your link, the bonus will be sent to your account automatically. The strategy is simple: the more links you send to your colleagues, family and friends - the more tokens you may earn!
You will earn 8% of the total amount that your referral will invest, and he or she will receive a 4% bonus.

wallet.walletAddressTip: A wallet address is a randomly generated set of numbers and letters. This set usually consists of 26 to 35 alphanumeric characters. A wallet address is ideally a one-time link generated by a wallet. Wallet addresses are needed to send or receive digital assets.
wallet.howtofindWalletAddress: How do I find my wallet address?
wallet.howtofindWalletAddressTip: A bitcoin wallet address is a hashed version of your public key.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frenquently asked questions
faq.question: How do i create a Rhapsody account ?
faq.answer: Simple, just click on the top button.

followUs.subtitleNews: Get updated with the latest {{subject}} news
followUs.subtitleContact: Wanna join the gang ? Contact us !
followUs.subtitleNewsletter: Join our community and BE updated on the next launched

footer.description: Rhapsody is the platform where music fans can invest in their favorite artists and be rewarded for supporting them.

home.metaDescription: Be part of your favorite artist's next projects
home.benefitsEventsText: Artists create and customize exclusive events to create a unique experience and share this with other collectors around the world.
home.benefitsDigitalText: Artists digital collectibles come in limited-edition releases, can be purchased, sold, and traded, placed in events, access to an exclusive community, shared on social and more.
home.benefitsPrivateText: You'll be able to access the private artist metaverse room, to chat live with the artist himself as well as other collectors.
home.benefitsMerchandizingText: Hoodies, caps, stickers... we'll create some reward collectible holders from the community and make our members feel even more part of the artist family.

join.adviseText: We enable your strategy to create a better experience for your community.
join.setupTitle: We setup the launch for you
join.setupText: We setup for you a whitelist and gamification system to help you grow the number of fans in your social network and the list
join.fansText: Rhapsody provides you with the ultimate playbook to build your success in the collectible world.
join.fundsText: We give you back up to 100% of the total amount raised.
join.safetyDescription: We are using blockchain technology in order to decentralize all the information related to your NFT and have another layer of security around your wallet.
join.heroSubtitle: The best tool for developing your career over the long term
join.heroText: Rhapsody defined your collectible strategy to grow and interact with your audience
join.contactText: Creating and developing a recurring and sustainable income with new assets

projectWaiting.paragraph: When  event start s you will be assigned a random place in line along side everyone else who arrived in this waiting room before the start.

signUp.stepOneSubtitle: To personalized your experiences with our app, we need some informations
signUp.stepTwoTitle: What type of music do you listen ?
signUp.stepTwoSubtitle: To improve your experiences with us, we would love to know more about you.

transactionFailure.try: Try with another card or change payment method!

transactionSuccess.title: Congratulations
transactionSuccess.owner: You are now a proud owner of
transactionSuccess.access: Access to album 2 weeks before everybody
